entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 28.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of light snow beginning late this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 28. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023
